Image Shop Menu Inventory How to play Settings Shop Back Tokens: Impressum Impressum Contact: Icons Creator: Icons created by Freepik from www.flaticon.com Icons created by srip from www.flaticon.com Stamp: \nIncreases range Customs duties: \nDouble income Packages: \n10 additional packages Delay: \nTemporarily increases time You do not have enough coins at the moment purchase donel ca-app-pub-3940256099942544/1033173712 Time remaining: There is no running timer at the moment The goal of the game is to deliver a package to a mailbox. For this, however, a package must first be obtained. Depending on the type of package, there are different levels of difficulty, so more packages. Various PowerUps can be bought in the shop, which can help you in the game. In the inventory you can see the current token number and packages.
